AI Description: Trinotate is a comprehensive annotation suite designed for functional annotation of de novo assembled transcriptomes, particularly for non-model organisms. It provides tools for sequence homology searches, protein domain predictions, functional annotation, and visualization of annotation results.
Core Features: Sequence Homology Searches (Blast), Protein Domain Predictions (Hmmer), Functional Annotation, Visualization Of Annotation Results
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, Transcriptomics, Functional Annotation
